video.title: American Horror Story
video.synopsis: This twisted Emmy-winning drama plays upon the power of supernatural fears and everyday horrors, exploring humankind's unsettling capacity for evil.

episodes.synopsis: Therapist Ben Harmon, his wife, Vivien, and their daughter, Violet, move across the country to Los Angeles to escape their troubled past.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Serial killer enthusiasts reenact the brutal murders of two nursing students. Ben goes back to Boston to fix a mistake involving an old flame.
episodes.title: Home Invasion

episodes.synopsis: Vivien learns about her house's first resident: a crazed surgeon named Dr. Montgomery. Meanwhile, Ben confronts Moira about his suspicous coffee.
episodes.title: Murder House

episodes.synopsis: Two of the house's previous residents, interior designers Chad and Patrick, give the Harmons decorating advice.
episodes.title: Halloween Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While on a date with Violet, Tate is harassed by a group of bloody teens. Meanwhile, Ben and Vivien are haunted by one of the house's newest guests.
episodes.title: Halloween Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Ben sees a new patient who is terrified by the legend of a man who slaughters those who repeat a specific mantra into a mirror.
episodes.title: Piggy Piggy

episodes.synopsis: Tate tells Violet that she can tell ghosts to leave her alone, and she takes solace in this. Meanwhile, Vivien learns she is pregnant.
episodes.title: Open House

episodes.synopsis: The man in the rubber suit is revealed, and Vivien has a violent situation arise with Ben.
episodes.title: Rubber Man

episodes.synopsis: One of history's most famous murder victims, Elizabeth Short, pays the house a visit. Constance discovers more about Tate.
episodes.title: Spooky Little Girl

episodes.synopsis: Ben finds out that Violet hasn't been in school for weeks. He also finds out who Tate really is.
episodes.title: Smoldering Children

episodes.synopsis: Vivien gives birth. Violet learns who fathered one of her new siblings.
episodes.title: Birth

episodes.synopsis: Constance schemes to raise Tate's baby as her own. Ben contemplates suicide.
episodes.title: Afterbirth

episodes.synopsis: Welcome to Briarcliff Manor, a notorious insane asylum that is home to a deranged serial killer known as Bloody Face.
episodes.title: Welcome to Briarcliff

episodes.synopsis: An exorcist is summoned to Briarcliff to help save a troubled farm boy. Sister Jude's darkest secret is revealed.
episodes.title: Tricks and Treats

episodes.synopsis: A group of patients attempt to escape from Briarcliff during a violent storm.
episodes.title: Nor'easter

episodes.synopsis: A new patient claiming to be Anne Frank exposes Arden's past. Kit learns why Grace was admitted to Briarcliff.
episodes.title: I Am Anne Frank Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sister Jude digs up dirt on Arden. Later, Kit makes a surprising confession and Bloody Face is unmasked.
episodes.title: I Am Anne Frank Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious little girl is abandoned at Briarcliff. The Monsignor makes a Faustian pact with Dr. Arden. The origin of Bloody Face is revealed.
episodes.title: Origins of Monstrosity

episodes.synopsis: Sister Mary Eunice is terrified to discover a dark angel has descended on Briarcliff. Kit makes a bold move to be reunited with Grace.
episodes.title: Dark Cousin

episodes.synopsis: A murderous Santa wreaks havoc on Briarcliff. Sister Jude faces off with the Devil. Arden has a shocking encounter in the Death Chute.
episodes.title: Unholy Night

episodes.synopsis: The Monsignor takes on an unlikely convert. Lana secures a new piece of evidence that can exonerate Kit. Dr. Arden witnesses a miraculous return.
episodes.title: The Coat Hanger

episodes.synopsis: The Monsignor confronts the Devil. Dr. Arden's experiments reach a shocking conclusion. Dr. Thredson facilitates a surprising reunion for Kit.
episodes.title: The Name Game

episodes.synopsis: Grace brings Kit devastating news about the aliens' experiments on Alma. Dr. Thredson gets an unexpected visitor. The Monsignor tries to silence Jude.
episodes.title: Spilt Milk

episodes.synopsis: A deadly new inmate threatens Sister Jude's chance of release from Briarcliff. Grace's obsession with the aliens turns violent.
episodes.title: Continuum

episodes.synopsis: Johnny sets out to complete his father's work. Lana leads the charge to finally shut down Briarcliff.
episodes.title: Madness Ends

episodes.synopsis: When Zoe exhibits a strange and terrible power, her parents ship her to a New Orleans home for those like her: witches descended from Salem.
episodes.title: Bitchcraft

episodes.synopsis: Fiona threatens a long-standing peace when she delves into Mme. LaLaurie's past, and Zoe and Madison resurrect one of the frat boys Madison killed.
episodes.title: Boy Parts

episodes.synopsis: Madison and Nan enrage the academy's pious new neighbor, Joan. Meanwhile, Fiona learns she has cancer, and Madison develops pyrokinesis.
episodes.title: The Replacements

episodes.synopsis: Fiona threatens the fragile peace with Marie Laveau, and the Council of Witchcraft appears to investigate Madison's disappearance.
episodes.title: Fearful Pranks Ensue

episodes.synopsis: Zoe reveals a new power during the zombie army siege. Meanwhile, Fiona exacts revenge on Myrtle when an attack leaves Cordelia blinded.
episodes.title: Burn, Witch. Burn!

episodes.synopsis: When Zoe, Queenie and Nan use a ouija board to find out what happened to Madison, they awaken the spirit of a long-dead serial killer, the Axeman.
episodes.title: The Axeman Cometh

episodes.synopsis: Fiona falls in love with the Axeman, and Marie Laveau offers Queenie a place with the practitioners if she'll deliver Mme. LaLaurie.
episodes.title: The Dead

episodes.synopsis: Cordelia encourages the girls to confront Fiona and force the selection of the next Supreme. Meanwhile, Marie Laveau begins her torment of Delphine.
episodes.title: The Sacred Taking

episodes.synopsis: Fiona proposes joining forces with Marie Laveau against witch hunter Hank, and Myrtle finally has her revenge against the Council of Witchcraft.
episodes.title: Head

episodes.synopsis: Fiona invites Stevie Nicks to the academy to sway potential Supreme (and Nicks superfan) Misty, and Nan learns the truth about Luke's death.
episodes.title: The Magical Delights of Stevie Nicks

episodes.synopsis: Fiona and Marie Laveau face off against the witch hunters of the Corporation, while Madison and Zoe feud over who deserves to be with Kyle.
episodes.title: Protect the Coven

episodes.synopsis: Cordelia regains her precognitive abilities and sees doom for the coven. Meanwhile, Queenie confronts Marie Laveau, with diabolical consequences.
episodes.title: Go to Hell

episodes.synopsis: Zoe, Madison, Misty and Queenie undergo the test of the Seven Wonders, seven magical challenges that will determine the coven's next Supreme.
episodes.title: The Seven Wonders

episodes.synopsis: After their mother is murdered, conjoined twins Bette and Dot are hired by freak show owner Elsa, who hopes the pair will save her struggling troupe.
episodes.title: Monsters Among Us

episodes.synopsis: With a killer on the loose, police impose a curfew on Jupiter. Elsa hires strongman Dell to handle security, unaware of his dark past with Ethel.
episodes.title: Massacres and Matinees

episodes.synopsis: To Elsa's annoyance, the freaks refuse to perform on Halloween, fearing a visit from freak ghost Edward Mordrake. Ethel receives some shattering news.
episodes.title: Edward Mordrake: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Mordrake hunts for a freak soul to add to his ghost troupe, prompting Elsa to reveal her past. Jimmy and Maggie have a violent run-in with Twisty.
episodes.title: Edward Mordrake: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Stanley unleashes his plan to murder the freaks, while Gloria hides evidence of Dandy's gory crimes and Desiree learns she is not what she seems.
episodes.title: Pink Cupcakes

episodes.synopsis: To prepare for her upcoming TV show, Elsa practices her dicey new knife-throwing act. At Mott Manor, Dandy declares his love for Bette and Dot.
episodes.title: Bullseye

episodes.synopsis: After retrieving the twins, Jimmy wonders about Dandy's connection to the clown murders, while the freak show women confront the murderous Dell.
episodes.title: Test of Strength

episodes.synopsis: Ma Petite's murder leads to a clash between Ethel and Elsa. Gloria desperately tries to save Dandy, while Jimmy connects with the show's new freak.
episodes.title: Blood Bath

episodes.synopsis: After a positive reading from Maggie, Dandy resumes his killing ways, while a sad, drunken Jimmy struggles to perform at a doomed Tupperware Party.
episodes.title: Tupperware Party Massacre

episodes.synopsis: Salty's death sparks trouble in Pepper and prompts Elsa to reveal the freak show's history. The twins try to help Jimmy after his arrest for murder.
episodes.title: Orphans

episodes.synopsis: As Elsa readies to move, the twins are seduced by an aspiring magician with a creepy past. To get out of jail, Jimmy makes a risky deal with Stanley.
episodes.title: Magical Thinking

episodes.synopsis: After Maggie outs Stanley as a homicidal conman, the freaks plot their grisly revenge. With Elsa's help, Jimmy comes to terms with his new deformity.
episodes.title: Show Stoppers

episodes.synopsis: With Elsa gone, Dandy takes over the show and disaster soon follows. After a discouraging start in Hollywood, Elsa's fortunes take an unexpected turn.
episodes.title: Curtain Call
